basics.name: Eduard Malokhvii
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: 👨‍💻 Inventive Full Stack Developer with over 2 years of wide knowledge in Python, Back-end Development, Web Scraping, Containerisation areas with strong experience in Vue.js, Front-end Development, CI/CD, networking. 🎓 BA & MA in Computer Engineering. 🚵🏊 Active sport participiant, ☕️ coffee adept.
